TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MetafileType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies types of metafiles. The property returns a member of this enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.MetafileType Emf = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies an Enhanced Metafile (EMF) file. Such a file contains only GDI records.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.MetafileType EmfPlusDual = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Specifies an EMF+ Dual file. Such a file contains GDI+ records along with alternative GDI records and can be displayed by using either GDI or GDI+. Displaying the records using GDI may cause some quality degradation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.MetafileType EmfPlusOnly = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Specifies an EMF+ file. Such a file contains only GDI+ records and must be displayed by using GDI+. Displaying the records using GDI may cause unpredictable results.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.MetafileType Invalid = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies a metafile format that is not recognized in GDI+.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.MetafileType Wmf = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies a WMF (Windows Metafile) file. Such a file contains only GDI records.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.MetafileType WmfPlaceable = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies a WMF (Windows Metafile) file that has a placeable metafile header in front of it.
